Parul Patil

Bio

I am a Third Year PhD Student in the department of Statistics at Virginia Tech. My research interest is in the field of Gaussian Processes. Currently I am working on forecasting Tick Populations using a Gaussian Process model.

Education

Virginia Tech | Blacksburg, Virginia PhD. in Statistics | Aug 2021 - May 2026 (anticipated)

University of Mumbai| Mumbai, India MSc. in Statistics | Aug 2018 - Oct 2020

Ramnarain Ruia Autonomous College | Mumbai, India BSc. in Statistics | Aug 2015 - May 2018
